snippet.title: Because of Magic - Tower Defense (PC Game)
snippet.description:
The Great Source of All Power is under attack!
Use your strategic skills to equip towers with magical powers.
Fight the enemy and save the world!

PLAY NOW: https://gamesbyrd.itch.io/becauseofmagic
